q: What is the goal of modelling in AI?
options: Collect data|Represent patterns and make predictions|Store information|Clean datasets
explain: Modelling helps machines learn patterns and make predictions.

q: Which type of model learns from labelled data?
explain: Supervised models use labelled data to learn.

q: Which model groups similar data points?
explain: Clustering groups similar data without labels.

q: Which of these is a supervised learning example?

options: Only classification|Only regression|Both classification and regression|Clustering

q: Which term refers to splitting data into training and testing?
explain: Validation ensures model quality using unseen data.

options: Model too simple|Model memorizes training data|Model ignores patterns|Model runs slowly
explain: Overfitting occurs when a model memorizes instead of learning.
